page.title: 16OLD PEOPLE
page.content: {OLD PEOPLE.} There are lots of{old people}in our area.They are just like any other{old {people}in Britain they look back whith affection and think that they had a better life than us.Some of them have lived here all their lives some even came to our school.Here is what one woman said"there were dances in the village hall every Saturday and we cycled to the pictures which are closed down now." They played games much the same as us like skipping and tig they also raided apple trees.I think they had a happy life better than ours.The{old people} enjoy walks and the scenery.I think the{old people}were the most interesting to talk to. The things they dont like are drugs and vandalisim.
